<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Scrying" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=141" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 324 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Barbatos](/Deities.aspx?ID=64), [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=218), [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=218)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You create an invisible floating eye at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). The eye can't move, but you can see in all directions from that point as if using your normal visual senses.
name: Clairvoyance

text: Clairvoyance Source Core Rulebook pg. 324 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Barbatos, Ravithra, Ravithra Cast 1 minute (material, somatic, verbal) Range 500 feet Duration 10 minutes --- You create an invisible floating eye at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). The eye can't move, but you can see in all directions from that point as if using your normal visual senses.
